sentence.Network_en: His last act must be a deed of impiety.
sentence.Network_cn: 他最后的行为就是这一种不孝.

sentence.Network_en: He had to leave his home because of impiety.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为不孝,他不得不离开家.

sentence.Network_en: His remarks show impiety to religion.
sentence.Network_cn: 他的话表现出对宗教的不敬.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 英语词汇分类(1) - linglong的日志 - 网易博客 ... anathema 革除教门 impiety 不虔诚，不敬神 lack of faith 不信教，不信神.

hieroglyphic的翻译查词例句词组大耳朵英语 ... wistful 渴望的, 想望的... impiety 无信仰, 不虔诚, 不孝.
红宝中没有的巴郎词汇 - 豆丁网 ... Ichthyology:n. 鱼类学 Impiety:n. 不敬，不虔诚 Impropriety:n. 不当行为，言语误用.

list.abs: in reply to this proteus sent back a messenger who said thus : " seize this man , whosoever he may be , who has done impiety to his own host , and bring him away into my presence , that I may know what he will find to say . "普洛透斯派回信使这样回答他说：“不管这个冒犯了东道主的人是谁

RelatedPhrase.word: He is guilty of filial impiety

list.key: He is guilty of filial impiety
list.abs: impiety (n.): lack of respect, esp. for religion 不敬；不恭He is guilty of filial impiety. 他犯有不孝之罪。You will not be forgiven for your impieties. 你对神不敬将得不到宽恕。
He had to leave his home because of impiety ., 因为不孝 , 他不得不离开家.
he is guilty of filial impiety ., 他犯有不孝之罪.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French impiete or Latin impietas, from impius 'impious'

means.word_mean: 1. unrighteousness by virtue of lacking respect for a god

auth_sentence.content: His temperamental impiety was soon evident.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: His temperamental impiety was soon evident.

auth_sentence.content: It must have been God's way of rebuking him for his impiety.
